GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

GetCellsCount.name: GetCellsCount
GetCellsCount.description: Get the number of cells in the current row.

GetCell.name: GetCell
GetCell.description: Get the cell by its position.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The cell position in the current table.

params.name: sHRule
params.description: The rule to either apply or ignore the height value to the current table row. Use the "atLeast" value to enable the SetHeight method use.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The height for the current table row measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). This value will be ignored if <code>sHRule="auto"<code>.

SetTableHeader.name: SetTableHeader
SetTableHeader.description: Specify that all the current table rows will be styled as its header row.

params.name: isHeader
params.description: The true value will enable the SetTableHeader method use.
